Kup:

Kup was worried about the rescued mission that Rodimus had sent a whi=
le ago, he opened the comlink and said "Kup to Wolfblade or Malice, report"=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 06, 2005 12:24 AM
  Subject: Re: Wolfblade =
/ Silence.


  Malice::

  He listened to her quietly, then nodded and foll=
owed her in robot mode, pulling out his disruptor rifle.  His sensor array =
sweeped the area, keeping her in sight while he followed.  His crimson opti=
cs looked for anything unusual, listened for what was not normal, keeping p=
ace with Wolfblade as they stalked their prey.  

  'Let's see who this is,=
 I don't appreichiate being watched,' he thought to himself.

  Dark Mouse =
<raccoon7679@...> wrote:
    Wolfblade:

    She was pleasently shock=
ed when he kissed her back so swiftly. She
    really wanted to have more t=
ime with him, but she tld herself that the
    Matrix just had it in for he=
r.  Her scanners showed a signal that came
    in close and then trailed of=
f. "Hmm, could be trouble."  Her optics
    flashed red then back to normal=
. "Ohhh, I hope it is. I am in the mood
    for kicking some slag. Or somet=
hing else."  She gave him a teasing
    look. Her honor programs told her s=
he was in the mood for an oil
    change more than anything. Then turned an=
d faced the direction of the
    signal. "Let's proceed with caution."  She=
 tranformed into wolf mode
    and started running towards the signal. Who =
needs caution anyway, she
    told herself. 



  "HA!  Is that all you got=
?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now? =
 You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
